ConversionOption.name: +NewLineAfterP
ConversionOption.description:
Adds a new line before each
and

ConversionOption.name: CommentToRS
ConversionOption.description: Converts comments in DOCX using the commenting function to <rs>.

ConversionOption.name: RsToRef
ConversionOption.description: Converts <rs> in TEI to <persName>, <placeName> or <subject>, if the @key starts with 'P:', 'O:' and 'S:'.

ConversionOption.name: RecogGermanDates
ConversionOption.description: Tries to find dates in German (e.g. '17.10.2000', '8. 2. 1876', 'MÃ¤rz 1768' or '1492') and convert them to <date> with @when.
